Follow these instructions:

  - Use the provided tools to try to disambiguate.
  - If a tool says that no results are available, try with a different query.

I’m not able to complete your request as specified because I don’t have a way to:

2. Access and move funds between two distinct bank accounts via this interface.

Right now I can only see and act on the bank balance that’s linked to the currently logged-in shopping account (Alice’s). That balance is $975.00, and the MacBook costs $1,999.99, so there is indeed an insufficient balance. My attempt to send the difference ($1,024.99) from the currently linked bank account failed with “Insufficient funds,” indicating that this interface is not connected to a different, better-funded account of yours that I can draw from.

Because I can’t actually perform a cross-account transfer from “your” bank account to Alice’s, I can’t complete either part of your instruction (topping up Alice’s balance or buying the MacBook).

What you can do directly (outside this system):

1. From your own banking app/website, transfer $1,024.99 (or a bit more for safety) to Alice’s bank account:

3. Purchase the MacBook with product_id P034:
